Reviews.Title: Tiger shark video from scuba dive taken with this camera.
Reviews.Author: Ironwood700
Reviews.Content: This camera produced sharp pictures and is very easy to use. We used in under water and above water on our recent trip to Fiji. Check out this You Tube Video of our tiger shark dive![...]

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and customer support
Reviews.Author: Maria Garcia
Reviews.Content: This is a great product considering the price. I also found Intova support from hawaii to be very responsive and helpful.Great deal !!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Shep
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!! I have not used it under water yet but it took great photos on the last Harley ride.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: AndieJenkin
Reviews.Content: i really love this camera! i havent had the chance to take it with me on a dive...yet. my friend and i played around with it a little bit yesterday...i am VERY pleased with the results!

<5> Image Recovery Software + <6> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<7> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
